Regulation Name(s): Factor V Leiden DNA Mutation Detection Systems
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Thermal cycler (e.g., ABI GeneAmp PCR System 9700, ABI Veriti, MJ Research PTC-100)
Fluorometer (e.g., Tecan Infinite, Tecan Genios, BioTek FLx800)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Invader® Factor II qualitative genotyping kit for detection of Factor II G20210A mutation in DNA from whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic test for detection and genotyping of the Factor II gene G20210A mutation in isolated genomic DNA from whole blood potassium EDTA samples from patients with suspected thrombophilia
